title: Arial rounded?
content:
hi   
   
I seem to keep using arial rounded in my design work, I was wondering if anyone can suggest a similar font, as all my work is starting to look the same.   
   
Jim   
===

 [‹ Go for rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925081037/http:/typophile.com/node/4869 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design and Type Books ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925081037/http:/typophile.com/node/4901 "Go to next forum topic")
author: union

comments.content:
Jim, there is actually a plain version of Arial, with cleanly truncated stems, which looks quite "similar" (as you requested) to Arial Rounded.   
   
So, if you were to use that typeface, your work would be different, even though it looked the same!   
   
Best of all, it's free, so you don't have to pay onerous licensing fees.
